response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. Given its importance, I am offering it to you at a special price of $12,000. This is a unique chance to secure a high-quality asset at a price that is higher than what you perceive its worth but still below my acquisition cost. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and allow us to collaborate on this exciting venture.", "product_price": 12000}
